select count(*) from (select a.*,b.name,b.head_image as headImage, c.name as departmentName,d.position_name as positionName, g.total_num as currentTotalNum, round(ifnull((g.total_num-e.total_num)/e.total_num*100,0),2) as riskRate, e.total_num as lastTotalNum,f.alarmTypes from (select police_id,sum(total_num) as total_num,sum(conduct_num) as conduct_num, sum(handling_case_num) as handling_case_num, sum(duty_num) as duty_num, sum(train_num) as train_num, sum(social_contact_num) as social_contact_num, sum(amily_evaluation_num) as amily_evaluation_num, sum(drink_num) as drink_num, sum(study_num) as study_num,sum(health_num) as health_num,sum(work_num) as work_num from risk_report_record where DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m')>=#{lastMonthTime} and DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m')<=#{dateTime} GROUP BY police_id limit #{num}) a left join user b on b.police_id=a.police_id left join department c on c.id=b.department_id left join police_position d on d.id=b.position_id left join (select * from risk_report_record where DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m')=#{dateTime}) g on g.police_id=a.police_id left join (select * from risk_report_record where DATE_FORMAT(creation_date, '%Y-%m')=#{lastDateTime}) e on e.police_id=a.police_id left join (select GROUP_CONCAT(alarm_type) as alarmTypes,police_id from(SELECT distinct police_id,alarm_type FROM risk_alarm where DATE_FORMAT(creation_date,'%Y-%m')=#{dateTime}) as a GROUP BY police_id) f on f.police_id=a.police_id where 1=1
